base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with a modern design.
part_description: Contains one top drawer and one lower cabinet door. Drawer is horizontal, positioned above the cabinet door. Handles on both parts are horizontal and centered.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides horizontally in and out of the top compartment, supported by internal rails. The cabinet door swings open on hinges located on one side, allowing access to the interior space. Both parts are designed for smooth operation and optimal storage efficiency.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or integrated into a kitchen setup, interacting with surrounding furniture. It allows users to store and organize items, with handles providing easy access. The modern design complements various interior styles.
